name: Quantum Hackathon 2025
description: A 3-day hackathon challenging participants to solve real-world problems using quantum algorithms.

name: Introduction to Qiskit Workshop
description: Learn the basics of quantum programming with IBM's Qiskit framework. No prior quantum knowledge required!

name: Guest Lecture: The Future of Quantum AI
description: Dr. Anya Sharma discusses breakthroughs and challenges in quantum artificial intelligence and its societal impact.

name: Member Social Mixer
description: Casual gathering to meet new members and network. Refreshments will be provided.

name: Founding Meeting
description: The very first meeting of Quantum Nexus, where we laid the groundwork for our club's mission.

name: Quantum Computing Basics Seminar
description: An introductory seminar covering the fundamental principles of quantum mechanics for computing.
